entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS EARLY THIS EVENING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE EARLY THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
